mapper.sql: deptId, deptName, deptDepict, deptJobDescription, deptState, belong
mapper.insert:
insert into dept
deptId,
deptName,
deptDepict,
deptJobDescription,
deptState,
belong,

mapper.update:
update dept
deptName = #{deptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deptDepict = #{deptdepict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deptJobDescription = #{deptjobdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deptState = #{deptstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
belong = #{belong,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where deptId = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dept set deptName = #{deptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptDepict = #{deptdepict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptJobDescription = #{deptjobdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptState = #{deptstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, belong = #{belong,jdbcType=INTEGER} where deptId = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
